result.title: Quality Assurance Plan (III)
result.description: The QAP, available by month 3, establishes the basis, procedures and tools for the management within the project. It includes the internal governance flows, communication channels and methods, the initially identified risks and contingency plans for each risk, the IMP, as well as the periodicity of the reporting to the task and WP leaders, to the coordinator and to the BBI.
